tool_description: Generates visual growth charts plotting the child's measurements over time against standard growth curves with percentile lines.

height_measurements.description: Array of height measurements corresponding to dates

weight_measurements.description: Array of weight measurements corresponding to dates

chart_type.description: Type of chart to generate (height, weight, head_circumference, or combined)

show_percentiles.description: Whether to show percentile reference lines

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All measurement arrays must have the same length as measurement_dates.
Insufficient data points: At least 2 data points are required to generate a meaningful chart.
Invalid chart type: Must be one of 'height', 'weight', 'head_circumference', or 'combined'.
Invalid age range: Age range must contain exactly 2 values with start < end.
No measurement data: At least one type of measurement data must be provided.
usage: Provide child ID, measurement dates, at least one measurement type array, and gender. The tool creates visual growth charts with optional percentile reference lines.

chart_url.description: URL or path to the generated chart image

chart_summary.description: Text summary of growth patterns observed in the chart

data_points_plotted.description: Number of data points included in the chart

chart_date_range.description: Start and end dates covered by the chart
